title: Linear matroid intersection is in quasi-NC.
abstract: Given two matroids on the same ground set, the matroid intersection problem asks to find a common independent set of maximum size. We show that the linear matroid intersection problem is in quasi-NC 2 . That is, it has uniform circuits of quasi-polynomial size  n   O (log n ) , and  O (log 2   n ) depth. This generalizes the similar result for the bipartite perfect matching problem. We do this by an almost complete derandomization of the Isolation lemma for matroid intersection.
